Description: Dish with a buff earthenware body and a thick green glaze imitating Chinese celadon.
Bibliographic references: Wood 2014 / A Technological Study of Mamluk Period Copies of Longquan Celadon Wares (fig.3)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2014 Sep-2015 Jan, BM WCEC, 'Ming: 50 years that changed China'
Acquisition name: Donated by: Prof J M Rogers
